item.title: LocalNet Adventure LA!! Reference Page
item.description: You can download the slides here Hey All! This page exists to supplement my LocalNet Adventure!! workshop with a lot of technical background that I don’t directly address in the workshop. Hopefully even if you’re a command line pro you’ll find something new here. References and Resources American Artist’s Black Gooey Universe Dhruv Mehrota’s Othernet NYCMesh Dan Phiffer’s Occupy.here Wifi art of Third Space Collective France Telecom’s Minitel Alternate Reality Games (e.
